tool_description: Search, autocomplete, and render emojis in SVG and PNG files.
name: The Emoji API
title: The Emoji API

api_list.name: Replace emoji short code in a string with Unicode emoji.
api_list.description: Send this endpoint a string and it will replace all short code with Unicode emoji.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://the-emoji-api.p.rapidapi.com/short_code/unicodify"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-emoji-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://the-emoji-api.p.rapidapi.com/short_code/unicodify"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-emoji-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
